component.name: annotateSample
component.doc: Runs Bowtie on a fasta file for mapping and stores results in FMI repository. Call sequence: annotateSample_anduril.py runs /GROUP/DeepSeqPipeline.Piotr/soft/annotateSample.pl.

output.name: annotateSample_log
output.doc: log file. contains time it toook to finish.

parameter.name: FMIid
parameter.doc: FMIid string. Looks like input filename without gz fastq extensions.

parameter.name: FMIpath
parameter.doc: Path to the FMI pipeline directory to find FMI tool.

parameter.name: perlPATH
parameter.doc: Path to right perl to use for execution.

parameter.name: FMI_output_dir
parameter.doc: Directory where FMI output is written to. It is used like the 'samples' directory of the FMI toolkit. I added this because I don't want to store all data in the standard samples repository.
